info.title: Quantcast API
info.description: Test our API services using interactive console. Quantcast API Beta

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Returns the list of networks accessible via the AP...
get.description: Returns the list of networks accessible via the API for an authenticated user.

get.summary: Returns a list of all of the available top-level c...
get.description: Returns a list of all of the available top-level calls for the specified network.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The optional platform filter.

get.summary: Returns the most recent assorted traffic summary d...
get.description: Returns the most recent assorted traffic summary data for the specified network.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

get.summary: Returns the historical numbers of page-views for t...
get.description: Returns the historical numbers of page-views for the specified network by day, week and month, if available.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

parameters.name: platform

parameters.name: country

get.summary: Returns the historical numbers of total visits for...
get.description: Returns the historical numbers of total visits for the specified network by day, week and month, if available.

parameters.name: pCode

parameters.name: country

parameters.name: platform

get.summary: Returns the historical numbers of visitors (cookie...
get.description: Returns the historical numbers of visitors (cookies or mobile devices) for the specified network by day, week and month, if available. This metric is equivalent to the Uniques metric in the web interface.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The optional platform filter.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes. Cannot be GLOBAL.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The optional platform filter.

parameters.name: country

get.summary: Returns the historical numbers of installations of...
get.description: Returns the historical numbers of installations of all mobile apps within the specified network by day, week and month, if available.

parameters.name: pCode

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

get.summary: Returns the historical numbers of upgrade actions ...
get.description: Returns the historical numbers of upgrade actions of all mobile apps within the specified network by day, week and month, if available.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

get.summary: Returns a list of all of the domains in the specif...
get.description: Returns a list of all of the domains in the specified network.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting offset for the result set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes. Cannot be GLOBAL. Leaving blank will default to US.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The optional platform filter.

get.summary: Returns a list of all of the top-level segments in...
get.description: Returns a list of all of the top-level segments in the specified network. To traverse this list, use the Segment.getSegment call for each segment whose children you wish to see.

parameters.name: pCode
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting offset for the result set.

parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The optional platform filter.

get.description: Returns a list of all of the syndicators within the given network.

parameters.name: offset

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network (p-code).

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the app.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The optional country filter http://developer.quantcast.com/docs/country_codes.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting offset for the result set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned.
